text:
Rupesh Reddy
Technology Consultant - EIT Services India Private Limited

Hyderabad, Telangana - Email me on Indeed: indeed.com/r/Rupesh-Reddy/5402dfa9c92fb7bf

• Possessing 6.3 years of IT experience in the domain of Data warehousing/Business Intelligence.
• Remarkable experience in SAP Business objects XIR2, XI 3.1, BI4.0 and BI4.1.
• Proficient in administration of Business Objects and Cognos repositories, services and servers
for high availability of environments.
• Basic overview of Tableau Administration.
• Extensively worked on CMC, Universe Designer, Desktop Intelligence, Infoview/BI Launch pad
and Web Intelligence.
• Experience in SAPBI 4.0/4.1 CMC, UDT, IDT, BI Launch Pad, WebI Rich Client, UMT, LCM.
• Experience in Migration from XIR2, XI3.1 to SAPBI 4.0 by using Upgrade Management Tool (UMT)
• Experience in converting .UNV to .UNX by using Information Design Tool (IDT)
• Using the Report Conversion Tool converted Desk I reports to Web I reports in BOXI 3.1 and
BI4.0.
• Experience in upgrading the environment from BI4.0 to BI4.1
• Web I Reports & Universes were deployed from Development to Production Environment
by using Life Cycle Management Console (LCM)
• Experience in setting up a Disaster Recovery Environment of Business Objects XIR3.1 and BI4.0
• Excellent knowledge on Cognos connection, Security and Configuration.
• Profile based Publications were created and scheduled reports to user BI Inbox.
• File & Scheduled based Events were created and scheduled the reports.
• Familiarity with Root Cause Analysis, Troubleshooting and Debugging of issues in Production
Environment.
• Extensively worked on Installation and Configuration of Business Objects.
• Experience in maintaining the environments.
• Remarkable experience in applying patches/fixes for SAP Business Objects XIR3.1, BI4.0 and
BI4.1.
• Proficient knowledge on Architecture and functioning of SAP Business Objects.
• Possess excellent communication, decision-making, problem solving, analytical and
interpersonal skills with result oriented dedication towards goals. Capable of working as a Team
Member or Individually with minimum supervision.
• An enthusiastic and project-oriented team player with solid communication, leadership skills
and the ability to develop creative solutions for challenging client needs.
• Flexible and versatile to adapt to any new environment with a strong desire to keep pace with
latest technologies.

This project is upgrading Business Intelligence 4.0 environment to latest available version of
Business Intelligence 4.1.
Roles and Responsibilities:
• Lead the team of 8 resources in upgrading Business Intelligence 4.0 to 4.1
• Coordinating with Wintel, Data protection and Database team for the backup.
• Involving vendor in case of any installation issues.
• Configuring the environment, Scaling of the services after the installation.
• Validation the environment, testing the work flow of the reports and the client tools before
releasing the environment to the customers.
• Fixing the issues found during end user testing, by involving vendor if needed.

https://www.indeed.com/r/Rupesh-Reddy/5402dfa9c92fb7bf?isid=rex-download&ikw=download-top&co=IN


PAN Card: BBDPR2171L

Issuing Office: Hyderabad
Issue Date: 31-Jan 2011
Expiry Date: 30-Jan 2021

WORK EXPERIENCE

Technology Consultant

EIT Services India Private Limited -

September 2015 to Present

Worked as Senior Systems Engineer for Infosys Limited from February 2012 to September 2015

DXC Technology, Business objects Administrator

EIT Services India Private Limited -  Bengaluru, Karnataka -

September 2015 to Present

Project #1: State Bank of Mauritius
Domain: Banking
Overview:
The business objective of this project is to have a unified reporting platform for accessing and
analysing the data from any business systems as per the business requirement. It includes
Development, Test, Stage and Production based Environment supporting 300+ users.
Environment:
• Four Environments - Development, Test, Stage and Production
• Clustered Environment
• Windows servers
• OS: Microsoft Windows 2008 Server

Role & Responsibilities:
• As a Team Lead currently handling 5 resources and helping them on delivery issues.
• Co-ordination with team on universe/report related issues and performance issues.
• Preparing weekly and monthly progress report.
• Upgraded the non-production environments to higher patch versions.
• Performed installation, configuration and scaling of the production environment.
• Ensure HA of the production environment. Participate and lead the DC-DR exercise.
• 2 months of client facing experience, which included the production go-lives. Handled the issues
raised post production go-live, ensured the stability of environment.
• Create and manage users, groups and folders. Ensure appropriate privileges are assigned to
the different users.
• Suggested and implemented publication mechanism for report spooling (file location based
triggering), which eliminated the manual report scheduling activity.
• Technical Proficiency: Understanding project related technical features, raising issues,
proactively identifying the issues.



• Project Completeness: Timeliness of deliverable, Timely Escalation / Status updates / reports,
Status updates of calls / requests, Problem solving, Ability to work out solutions independently.
• Independently perform complex troubleshooting, root-cause analysis, solution development.
• Interact with end users or clients to resolve issues with Business objects.
• Coordinate with SAP support for patches and bug fixes.
• To manage nodes, servers and services.
• Backup and restore of Business Objects.
• Worked with Wintel and DBA team related to OS and Database related issues.
• Monitoring the Jobs and sever space availability and CPU Process.
• Deployment/Migrations of folders and objects from DEV to TEST, TEST to UAT and UAT to PROD
environment.
• Recommend and implement of automation for known and recurring activities.
• Preparing standard operating procedures for related Business Object issues.
• Handled the basic report development and maintenance activities.
• ALM Owner: ALM (Tool for tracking and monitoring the defects raised for the UAT report related
issues)
• HPSM Lead: HPSM (Tool for tracking and monitoring the defects raised for the PROD report
related issues)

Infosys Limited, Business objects Administrator

Business objects -  Bengaluru, Karnataka -

February 2012 to September 2015

Project #1: Pfizer Pharmaceuticals
Domain: Life sciences

EDUCATION

B.Tech in Electronics and Communication Engineering

Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering and Technology Affiliated -  Anantapur, Andhra
Pradesh

2007 to 2011

ADDITIONAL INFORMATION

Soft Skills:
• Cross Cultural Sensitivity
• Written Communication Skills
• Articulation Skills
• Effective Meetings
skills: SDLC Environment Management (DEV, TEST, UAT, PROD)
Installation and Configuration of Business Objects
OS and Database related issues troubleshooting
